english.segment1: He lives out there somewhere. Beyond the land of the lost. I hate me when I find. That I laugh the most
english.segment2: With no cares out in his chair. Just watching it all go by. He dances on occasion. On the roadside
english.segment3: Why do people say. I think that he is strange and crazy, maybe. Someone's gotta give. And show him how to live today
english.segment5: Here she comes, she's another one. With tangled hair, in need of love. She tries to hide her face. From everyone in every place
english.segment6: Why do people say. I think that she is strange and crazy, maybe. Someone's gotta give and show her how to live. Today
